details: Ad Mania, an advertising event was conducted jointly by the B.Com and BMS departments of SIES College of Commerce and Economics on 1st September, 2016. It was an intra collegiate event, and invited participation from all departments with the college. 11 teams participated in the event from different departments. The students were asked to make television, radio and print ads on products given to them.
Conducted PPT Competition on ?Innovative Approaches towards Environment Conservation? in August 2016
Parent Teachers Meeting for TY and SYBMS was conducted on 30th July 2016
Orientation for FYBMS was conducted on 30th July 2016
orientation and parent teacher meet conducted for all bfm students
Intra Departmental debate competition Elimination and Finals rounds were conducted which was judged by Industry experts
A seminar on How to prepare for competitive exams for BMS Students was conducted by Mr. Gulab Nebhani, Director of Planet E on 11th July 2016.

? TYBMS syllabus revision workshop was organized on 29th June 2016. More than 140 faculties from across colleges attended the workshop. It was chaired by Dr. Gadade, Coordinator Faculty of Commerce, University of Mumbai, Dr. Parag Ajgaonkar, Chairman of Board of Studies, other members of Board of Studies and resource persons.
Lead organiser for TYBMS Syllabus Revision Workshop
Students of TY. BBI organised Quiz Competition for T.Y.BBI on trends in banking
Quiz competition for S.Y.BBI on current affairs was conducted by students
? Seminar on Career Counselling on CAT / CMAT / CET for BFM Students was conducted by Mr. Gulab Nebhani, Director of Planet E.
Orientation programme for TYBMS & SYBMS students was organized on 7th June 2016.
Essay Competition was arranged on various topics related to banks and finance industry

? Industrial Visit to Shimla- Manali- Chandigarh was scheduled in February 2016. The students were taken by Flight to Delhi where they visited the first industry and then departed for Manali where the stay was for 2 nights post which they left for an industrial visit to Chandigarh.
organised by Ecoreco for E waste management and recycling techniques
For the First time an event named Finatix was organised in SIES College, Sion (East) by BCOM(A&F) department on 30th January,2016. Event Head Ms Shruti Manniadar
Intra department Poster Making competition topics for posters environment, management , marketing, international finance et.al.
Google Hangout lecture series was organised in collaboration with SIES Management & ASQ on various topics like Leadership, Decision making, Project Management & Time Management.
BMS department in association with the Entrepreneurship Cell conducted a seminar on ?Entrepreneurship? by Dhariya Poojara, CEO Y Centre.
An interactive t?te-?-t?te was conducted by Hiralal Yadav, a social activist with BMS students about his journey on seatless cycle all over India
A seminar on Mutual Funds was conducted by Ambition Learning for BMS students
A workshop on ?Tips & Tricks of Competitive exams? was conducted by VPROV for BMS students

? FINOVA was conceptualized by the department of financial markets with the theme of spreading financial awareness and literacy. It was inaugurated by our Principal, Dr. Kinnarry Thakkar. More than 1000 students across Mumbai participated in various events and seminars over two days on 14 & 15 December 2015. ? NSDL selected Sreelaxmi MenonTejas S.as brand ambassadors.
? A debate competition for BFM students was held in July, the topic was ?E Commerce the way to go?.
An ?Investment Awareness Programme of NSE was organized for students of BMS. Mr. Kalpesh Panchal, Certified Financial Planner from Skyes and Edupro conducted the session.
Seminar on ?Ethical Hacking? for BSc IT students was conducted by Mr. Girish Gadekar, Marketing Manager, Pristine Info Solution.
Seminar on ?Ethical Hacking? for BSc IT students was conducted by Mr. Girish Gadekar, Marketing Manager, Pristine Info Solution.
Seminar on ?Advanced Java? for T.Y.BSc IT students was conducted by CMS IT Services PVT. Ltd.
Seminar on ?Advanced Java? for T.Y.BSc IT students was conducted by CMS IT Services PVT. Ltd.
? NSDL had conducted a seminar, Eklavya in September 2015 on ?How to do Trading?.
Seminar on ?Trends in Animation and Multimedia? for F.Y.BSc IT students was conducted by Ms. SonaJiandani, Marketing Manager, Arena Animations.

Seminar on ?Career options in IT ? for F.Y.BSc IT students and ?Aptitude Session & Interview Technique and Project guidance? for S.Y.BSc IT & T.Y. BSc IT students were conducted by Mr. Rohit Gupta, Marketing Manager, SEED Infotech.
?Remedial coaching sessions? in the subject of Applied Maths II for F.Y.BSc ATKT students were conducted by Mr. Ajay Gupta.
Session on Aptitude Test and Interview techniques for T.Y.BSc IT students was conducted by Mrs. Nisha Kishor Dang, Faculty of B.Com Dept.
Session on Aptitude Test and Interview techniques for T.Y.BSc IT students was conducted by Mrs. Nisha Kishor Dang, Faculty of B.Com Dept.
Seminar on ?Cyber Security? for BSc IT students was conducted by Mr. Manish Singh, Sr. Marketing Manager, Microsoft ATS.

Orientation session was arranged for students of FYBMS and their parents to acquaint them with the University and College rules and regulations as well as growth opportunities available to the students in the college.

? Orientation Programme was conducted for academic year 2015 -16 of FY BFMparents and students in July 2015 to make them aware of college rules and regulations. ? Parent Teacher Meetings were also conducted for SY & TY BFM students in July.

A guest lecture/Alumni lecture was organised by BMS Coordinator, Jinal Shah for TYBMS students wherein the speaker for the session was Ms. Praveena Vaidyan, BMS alumni from bacth 14-15 and currently the Assistant Manager - Communications at Novotel Hotel, Mumbai.
A session on Personal Branding on Social Media was taken by Ms. Jinal Shah for SYBMS and TYBMS students on 20th June, 2018.

Pad Man Movie review was organized by Jinal Shah on 12/02/18 wherein 40 BMS students saw the Pad Man movie in PVR Sion followed by a group discussion in the class. Students shared insights of various management and marketing concepts that were applicable in the movie.
Annual Tech Fest of B.Sc It Department EDIT V4.0. Various IT and Non IT events were organized.
